thread.title: River Tiber Drops Visuals for “Acid Test” Ahead of Touring with D.R.A.M.
thread.title_full: River Tiber Drops Visuals for “Acid Test” Ahead of Touring with D.R.A.M.

author: Stephanie Smith-Strickland
title: River Tiber Drops Visuals for “Acid Test” Ahead of Touring with D.R.A.M.
text:
Toronto-based singer and songwriter River Tiber , born Tommy Paxton-Beesley, has leveraged his notoriety from projects with Drake and BADBADNOTGOOD to kick off 2017 with a bang. The first of which being the release of a music video for his song “Acid Test,” which was premiered through Zane Lowe World Record’s in 2016.
In keeping with the spirit of the song’s complex soundscape and Tiber’s richly emotive voice, the music video is a riot of color and texture. Tiber also got quite the vacation out of the deal – everything was shot on location in Morocco. The artist made it a point to find colorful tile work, ancient architecture and the occasional sunny scenes of life which he juxtaposed against contemplative shots of himself lounging poolside and against the backdrop of the city.
Tiber also announced that he will be the opening act for D.R.A.M. whose single “Broccoli” made huge waves in 2016. Peep the tour dates below if you’re interested in seeing either party live in action.
Jan 13 – Nashville, TN – Exit In
Jan 14 – Atlanta, GA – The Loft
Jan 15 – Norfolk, VA – The NorVa
Jan 17 – Washington, DC – U Street Music Hall
Jan 19 – Philadelphia, PA – The Foundry @ The Fillmore
Jan 20 – Brooklyn, NY – Music Hall Williamsburg
Jan 21 – New York, NY – Bowery Ballroom
Jan 22 – Cambridge, MA – The Sinclair
Jan 25 – Cleveland, OH – Grog Shop
Jan 26 – Detroit, MI – El Club
Jan 27 – Chicago, IL – Metro
